TestCase.TestCaseObjective: BSO validation. Test whether the Producer/Provider is able to create a Light (MeteorologicFeature) and the Consumers/Receivers are able to understand (and display) it correctly.
TestCase.TestCaseScenario: The Producer creates an Light (MeteorologicFeature)The Consumers receive the information and interpret it correctly.
TestCase.TestCaseEnvironment: Internet or Co-located. Exchange Pattern: R/R, P/S.
TestCase.TestCasePreCondition: The Producer/Provider has created a topic which includes message elements belonging to the MeteorologicFeature message schema area. The Consumers have subscribed to this topic.
TestCase.TestCaseConclusion: This test is considered a success if the Light is processed and interpreted correctly on all Nations' C2IS.

TestCaseStep.TestCaseStepAction:
The Producer (A) creates a Light (MeteorologicFeature) with name XXX_LIGHT_5305 and information for the following attributes: * Location * Interpretation * ProbabilityPercent * Source * DownTime * MoonPhase * UpTime
Notices: XXX in name of the object is meant (in principle) to be replaced by the 3 letter code of the country name. Example for the name of the Organisation: ITA_ LIGHT_5305
TestCaseStep.TestCaseStepResult: Consumers (B) receive and display the Light correctly.
